sen.e: One day, Tauchi noticed that the man was hiding in the closet, but was lashed back with a sward and injured his both legs, and both the woman and man fled.

sen.e: However, it is said that he was accused for not having the samurai spirit because of his shameless behavior, and committed Seppuku (suicide by disembowelment) on the day.
